column5: Im having trouble finding information on where I can fish on the Toronto Islands, could anyone help me out?  Id like to go this weekend if I can.
Grab 2 rods, a lot of topwater lures, senkos and heavy jigs. Grag a google map and start beating the shoreline. You need 2 or 3 days to cover it all.

There are plenty of spots to fish all over. However, it gets hit quite hard on weekends so you'd be better off heading out on a week day if at all possible. I would also recommend you bring waders so you can access the spots that don't get hit as much.
